ComicInfo.Summary:
Regular SolicitSpend Halloween with three creepy tales from Honey Island Swamp! Novelist SA Check (Volcanosaurus) delivers the doomed destiny of a circus troupe attempting to add Victor Crowley to their freakshow. In "Following," writer Jason Pell (Beware the Witch's Shadow) shows us that heartbreak can lead to a fatal outcome. And in "Patchwork," horror author James Kuhoric (Freddy vs Jason vs Ash) delivers a Halloween monster mash of bloody revenge. Plus - a horrific bonus - enjoy several holiday themed pages to give horror fabs a bloody bit of holiday entertainment in the gory Hatchet vein! Victor Crowley's Hatchet Halloween Tales #1 is available with three covers - Main Cover by Roy Allan Martinez, Bonk Movie Parody Variant, and Deluxe Limited Edition Hatchet 1/350 Bloody Horror Cvr also by Martinez!
Limited Edition Solicit (?)A limited edition variant cover of the Halloween horror event of the year! Don't miss out on these bloody Hatchet tales inspired by the season.
Limited Edition Solicit (500)Spend Halloween with three creepy tales from Honey Island Swamp with a rare edition previously only available on the American Mythology website and limited to only 500 copies!
